qualifiers.applicability: Entryways that are recessed beyond the house facade and roof
qualifiers.exclusions: Entryways that are not vaulted or not recessed

dimensional.name: Height
dimensional.description: Height of the entry feature from grade to ridge

dimensional.name: Grade
dimensional.description: Ground level at the base of the entry feature

dimensional.name: Intersection
dimensional.description: Intersection of front facade and top of roof material at ridge

dimensional.name: Porch Floor Plan
dimensional.description: Outline of entryway roof and floor area

material.name: Outside Material
material.description: Material used on the outside of the entryway feature

procedures.name: Area Measurement
procedures.description: The area is measured to the outside material of the entryway feature

mandatory.description: The area of the entryway counts TWICE toward gross floor area if it is vaulted

conditional_logic.condition: If the entryway is considered to be a vaulted entryway
conditional_logic.outcome: The area will be counted TWICE toward gross floor area

special_cases.description: A portion of the entryway is recessed beyond the house facade and roof. It is included in the area that counts.
